attributes.action: Publish government studies and models used in dealing with Coronavirus outbreak
attributes.additional_details:
With unprecedented access to information, ranging from independent analysis to advanced research papers, this pandemic brought many people to inform themselves. Many of whom have intellectual curiosity and competence to grasp advanced scientific concepts to explain and discuss with their social circles.
It is of great importance therefore for a government to involve people by transparently communicating why certain measures are chosen to manage a crisis, no matter how complex the explanation is.
attributes.background: We would like the government to bring transparency and clarity by publishing and continuously updating the studies, strategies and models adopted that result in policies to deal with ongoing Coronavirus outbreak.
